title: Note on Open String/D-brane System and Noncommutative Soliton
abstract: This is a summary of a series of papers hep-th/9910263,0005283,0010066 written with B. Chen, T. Matsuo and K. Murakami on a p-p', (p<p^{\prime}) open string with B_{ij} field, which has led us to the explicit identification of the Dp-brane with the noncommutative projector soliton via the gaussian damping factor. A lecture given at Summer Institute 2000, FujiYoshida, Yamanashi, Japan, at August 7-14, 2000.
